The Lord of the Rings Online

wikitext.*:
'''Southern Star''' was a variety of pipe-weed grown in the [[Southfarthing]] of [[the Shire]], and apparently originating in the district around [[Longbottom]]. The 'star' of its name presumably refers to the star-shaped flowers of the [[pipe-weed]] plant.<ref>{{FR|Pipeweed}}</ref>

==Other versions of the legendarium==
In the second (out of seven) drafts of [[Prologue Concerning Hobbits, and other matters|Prologue]], "Southern Star" was originally named "Hornpipe Twist".<ref>{{PM|Prologue}}, p. 6</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
[[Image:Item-Southern Star Pipe-weed.jpg|thumb]]
'''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:The smoke from Southern Star Pipe-weed takes the form of two smoke rings that pass through each other as they float out from the pipe.
